title: Police probe launched after car ends up in ditch near Doncaster leaving two men seriously injured
text:
The men were travelling along Ferry Road, Haxey, in a blue Ford Fiesta when the car left the road and came to rest in a ditch.

Emergency services were alerted to the incident at around 10.45pm.

The passenger suffered potentially life threatening injuries and the driver was also seriously injured.

Ferry Road, Haxey
